updates.HtmlString: Updated marketing cards to be more accurate for set, plus set chances as 1:3 token:marketing for core sets, 2:3 for expansions, and 9:1 as of Battle for Zendikar.
Updated foil chances. Now 15/67 chance a booster has a foil, includes basic lands, and it always replaces a common.
Evening: Prerelease: Added actual Prerelease seeded pack contents.
Evening: Added Holiday Gift Box pack-ins.
Evening: Added actual spindown life counters and the Abzan Clan Info card.
Evening: Added most of the actual Clan pack-ins and the Fat Pack pack-ins.
Evening: Updated seeded clan packs with what we're seeing in the tracking spreadsheet. Thanks, Wolfninja for the heads up!
Noon: Added updated prerelease pack-ins from here.
Midnight: Added Fat Pack pack-in placeholders and Holiday Gift Box product.
Afternoon: Seeded booster first slot possibilities now made up of the clan's Khan and all clan rares.
